caravan_court.name: Caravan Court
caravan_court.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take all Fighters from this space. Owner: +1 Fighter. (Fighters accumulate here each round)
caravan_court.details: At the start of each round, 1 Fighter is placed here. When used, take all accumulated Fighters.

dragon_tower.name: Dragon Tower
dragon_tower.body: Cost: 3 Gold. Action: Take 1 Wizard + draw 1 Intrigue card. Owner: Draw 1 Intrigue card.
dragon_tower.details: Good value building that provides both an adventurer and an Intrigue card.

fetlock_court.name: Fetlock Court
fetlock_court.body: Cost: 8 Gold. Action: Take 2 Fighters + 1 Wizard. Owner: +1 Fighter or Wizard.
fetlock_court.details: Expensive but powerful building providing 3 adventurers.

the_golden_horn.name: The Golden Horn
the_golden_horn.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take all Gold from this space. Owner: +2 Gold. (Gold accumulates here each round)
the_golden_horn.details: At the start of each round, 2 Gold is placed here. When used, take all accumulated Gold.

helmstar_warehouse.name: Helmstar Warehouse
helmstar_warehouse.body: Cost: 3 Gold. Action: Take 2 Rogues + 2 Gold. Owner: +1 Rogue.
helmstar_warehouse.details: Excellent value building providing both adventurers and gold.

heroes_garden.name: Heroes' Garden
heroes_garden.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take 1 face-up Quest; if you complete it this turn, score +4 VP. Owner: +2 VP.
heroes_garden.details: Powerful building that rewards completing a Quest immediately after taking it.

house_of_good_spirits.name: House of Good Spirits
house_of_good_spirits.body: Cost: 3 Gold. Action: Take 1 Fighter + 1 adventurer of any type. Owner: +1 Fighter.
house_of_good_spirits.details: Flexible building providing a Fighter plus your choice of adventurer.

house_of_heroes.name: House of Heroes
house_of_heroes.body: Cost: 8 Gold. Action: Take 1 Cleric + 2 Fighters. Owner: +1 Cleric or Fighter.
house_of_heroes.details: Expensive building good for Piety and Warfare quests.

house_of_the_moon.name: House of the Moon
house_of_the_moon.body: Cost: 3 Gold. Action: Take 1 Cleric + take 1 face-up Quest. Owner: +2 Gold.
house_of_the_moon.details: Combines adventurer collection with Quest acquisition.

house_of_wonder.name: House of Wonder
house_of_wonder.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Pay 2 Gold to take 2 Clerics or Wizards (any combination). Owner: +2 Gold.
house_of_wonder.details: Flexible but requires payment. Good for Arcana and Piety quests.

jesters_court.name: Jesters' Court
jesters_court.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take all Rogues from this space. Owner: +1 Rogue. (Rogues accumulate here each round)
jesters_court.details: At the start of each round, 2 Rogues are placed here. When used, take all accumulated Rogues.

new_olamn.name: New Olamn
new_olamn.body: Cost: 8 Gold. Action: Take 2 Rogues + 1 Wizard. Owner: +1 Rogue or Wizard.
new_olamn.details: Expensive building for Skullduggery and Arcana quests.

northgate.name: Northgate
northgate.body: Cost: 3 Gold. Action: Take 1 adventurer of any type + 2 Gold. Owner: +2 VP.
northgate.details: Flexible and inexpensive. Good early purchase.

the_palace_of_waterdeep.name: The Palace of Waterdeep
the_palace_of_waterdeep.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take the Ambassador (extra Agent for this round only). Owner: +2 VP.
the_palace_of_waterdeep.details: The Ambassador returns to this space at end of round. Only one player can have it per round.

the_skulkway.name: The Skulkway
the_skulkway.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take 1 Fighter + 1 Rogue + 2 Gold. Owner: +1 Fighter or Rogue.
the_skulkway.details: Versatile building providing multiple resource types.

smugglers_dock.name: Smuggler's Dock
smugglers_dock.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Pay 2 Gold to take 4 Fighters or Rogues (any combination). Owner: +2 Gold.
smugglers_dock.details: High volume but requires payment. Excellent for Warfare/Skullduggery.

spires_of_the_morning.name: Spires of the Morning
spires_of_the_morning.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take all Clerics from this space. Owner: +2 VP. (Clerics accumulate here each round)
spires_of_the_morning.details: At the start of each round, 1 Cleric is placed here. When used, take all accumulated Clerics.

the_stone_house.name: The Stone House
the_stone_house.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take 1 Gold for each Building tile in play (including this one). Owner: +2 Gold.
the_stone_house.details: Scales with game progress. Better in late game with many buildings in play.

the_three_pearls.name: The Three Pearls
the_three_pearls.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Return 2 adventurers to supply, then take 3 adventurers of any type. Owner: +2 Gold.
the_three_pearls.details: Converts unwanted adventurers into ones you need. Net gain of 1 adventurer.

the_tower_of_luck.name: The Tower of Luck
the_tower_of_luck.body: Cost: 8 Gold. Action: Take 1 Cleric + 2 Rogues. Owner: +1 Cleric or Rogue.
the_tower_of_luck.details: Expensive building for Piety and Skullduggery quests.

tower_of_the_order.name: Tower of the Order
tower_of_the_order.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take all Wizards from this space. Owner: Draw 1 Intrigue card. (Wizards accumulate here each round)
tower_of_the_order.details: At the start of each round, 1 Wizard is placed here. When used, take all accumulated Wizards.

the_waymoot.name: The Waymoot
the_waymoot.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Score all VP tokens on this space + take 1 face-up Quest. Owner: +2 VP.
the_waymoot.details: VP tokens accumulate here each round. Good value if left unused for several rounds.

the_yawning_portal.name: The Yawning Portal
the_yawning_portal.body: Cost: 4 Gold. Action: Take 2 adventurers of any type from the supply. Owner: +1 adventurer of any type.
the_yawning_portal.details: Maximum flexibility. One of the most versatile buildings.

the_zoarstar.name: The Zoarstar
the_zoarstar.body: Cost: 8 Gold. Action: Choose any action space with an opponent's Agent and use that action. Owner: +2 VP.
the_zoarstar.details: Expensive but powerful. Lets you use an action space that's already occupied.
